long_description: Whether tooling around town or commuting to campus or work, the Scott Metrix 20 bike supplies an upright, swift ride and dependable Shimano parts for everyday use. Flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position that also allows better visiblity than traditional road bike drop handlebars. 6061 aluminum frame offers sturdy performance to tackle urban avenues, scenic paths and long country roads; sloped top tube eases mounts/dismounts. Carbon fork helps reduce weight and damps road vibrations to enhance comfort. Snappy Shimano Sora trigger shifters and derailleurs ensure fast, precise shifts though the wide-ranging and easy-spinning 18 gear combinations. Fast-rolling and agile 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Continental Ultra Sport II tires so you can cruise along on a swift, sporty ride. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Scott Metrix 20 bike are subject to change.
